verbs.description: [ARG1: A court battle] [V: is] [ARG2: likely] [ARGM-ADV: if Trump 's team argues that the president ca n't be forced to answer questions or be charged with obstruction of justice] .
A court battle is likely if [ARG0: Trump 's team] [V: argues] [ARG1: that the president ca n't be forced to answer questions or be charged with obstruction of justice] .
A court battle is likely if Trump 's team argues that the president [V: ca] n't be forced to answer questions or be charged with obstruction of justice .
A court battle is likely if Trump 's team argues that the president ca n't [V: be] forced to answer questions or be charged with obstruction of justice .
A court battle is likely if Trump 's team argues that [ARG1: the president] [ARGM-MOD: ca] [ARGM-NEG: n't] be [V: forced] [ARG2: to answer questions or be charged with obstruction of justice] .
A court battle is likely if Trump 's team argues that [ARG0: the president] ca n't be forced to [V: answer] [ARG1: questions] or be charged with obstruction of justice .
A court battle is likely if Trump 's team argues that the president ca n't be forced to answer questions or [V: be] charged with obstruction of justice .
A court battle is likely if Trump 's team argues that [ARG1: the president] [ARGM-MOD: ca] [ARGM-NEG: n't] be forced to answer questions or be [V: charged] [ARG2: with obstruction of justice] .
